name: Black White Reset!
description:
Black White Reset!

A game for BYOG 2021 under the theme of "Two views" "Reset" and "Minimal Interaction".  To play game, unzip the file and click on Black-White Reset.exe

  • It is a double infinite runner game comprising of a Circular player character in each world/part of screen. 
  • Last the longest in the run to get the best score (you may occasionally get bonus points based on any power ups)
  • One world is black and other is white and they can swap their colours on hitting spacebar. Move player Character by using up/down arrow keys.
  • Regular Obstacles can be of Black or White colour and appear on either of the worlds
    • Obstacles that are of the same colour as the world, become invisible and player character can pass through it without getting destroyed/Affected. If the obstacles and world’s colours are different; then they collide with the player character and player character gets destroyed! Ending the run.
    • Pick up special power ups (yellow, green) for invincibility and bonus score .
    • Last longest in the game/run to win a new high score.

      Contributors:

      Sathyanshu Shukla 
      Khushboo Gupta
